sensor/type_s: type of magnetic sensor [ Induction Coil | flux gate | ...]
datum_s: datum for location [ relative | WGS84 | UTMZone | ...]
units_s: units of magnetic field data [ counts | mV | ... ]
h_field/min_start_d: minimum h-field value at beginning of measurement
h_field/max_start_d: maximum h-field value at beginning of measurement
h_field/min_end_d: minimum h-field value at end of measurement
h_field/max_end_d: maximum h-field value at end of measurement
calibration/file_name_s: name or link to calibration data
data_quality/rating_d: data quality rating based on some sort of statistic
data_quality/warning_comments_s: any warnings about data quality (ie. noise sources, chewed cables, ...)
data_quality/author_s: person who did QC/QA on data
filter/type_s: any type of filter used during recording
